text:
So there's the new release on quotes I see:

Now, one-time discounts, fees, or taxes will only apply to "at payment" line items. Note: if you choose Stripe as your payment method, all line items will be treated as "at payment." <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/quotes/use-quotes|Learn more.>

This is a problem for some clients as they might have a one-time discount for say year 1 or a future dated line item for say "Onboarding".  What are others looking at for this?
